parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets facial animation phase (eye blinking), blink is in the range from <tt>0</tt> to <tt>1</tt>. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is not functional in Arma 3</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person '''setFaceAnimation''' blink

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> blink: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier1 [[setFaceAnimation]] 0.5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setRandomLip]], [[setMimic]], [[animate]], [[animationPhase]], [[animateDoor]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 09:01, 23 December 2008 (CET)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Setting face animation to 4 will give "devilish" features (ArmA)</dd>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
